::nighlight/windlord::

nightlight's cicuits repaired in 41%.

Windlord signed "well... i don't sure if would be a good place, let 
me show you..."

the hawk moved to a computer and dowload athe information tha he had. 
the screen showed a abandoded-ship, that was traped in a gap among 
two mountains almost covered by rocks.

"That's the place" he said "it has low energy but it's funtional... 
whoever had lived there have left... I came in by a hole in the 
shell... but we can fix it... may i sugest make a list of all things 
that this ship has and organize our move while Nighlight is 
fuctional?"

repation of nighlight has done in 50%


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He's still not sure he believes Perplex but he decides to drop 
it.  "As 
> soon as Nightlight is functional we move out.  Windlord knows 
somewhere we 
> can get weapons and shields.  For some reason I don't think we 
should abandon 
> this ship just yet."
